About me

title: Real eState Portal
description: An online Real Estate Application , Allows user to find the best property around his area
html:
Real E State Application that covers the area of property finding and listing

This project is an online portal that helps the user to find their dream property by a few clicks. Their are general users who can view search filter properties .There also agent user who can upload one or more properties which are validated by the organization. It provides a smooth UI to the user.

Features:

  1. An Advance search bar based on the location
  2. An easy and flexible filter for finding the properties based on their details
  3. An Beautiful Image Gallery and Image Preview which show the photos of the properties
  4. User Authentication and Authorization

Techs used in :

  • React
  • Redux
  • Node.js
  • Express.js
  • MongoDB

Technical Features :

  • User Authentication Based on JWT
  • An geocoding Api and rendering of map
  • Advance Filter System
    • An Rest Api
Live here Github Link

title: Wordo - Keep Track of Daily Vocabularies.
description: Wordo provides a clean interface for the user to extract and keep track of their Daily Vocubularies.
html:
Wordo

Wordo let you extract vocubularies from an article you have read. It's also give an simple colorful user interface to browse words based on the day they are inserted.

Techs used in :

  • React.js
  • Styled-Components
  • Framer-motion
  • Node.js
  • Express.js
Github Link

title: Data Structures in Javascript
description: A small library of data structures and algorithms which are implemented in Javascript.
html:
A Small Libary Data Structures and Algorithms in Javascript

I tried to implement popular Data Structures and Algorithms in Javascript.

Data Structures that are implemented :

  • Stack
  • Queue - General, Priority
  • Linked List - Singly - Doubly
  • Tree - Binary Tree , Binary Search Tree
  • Heap - Binary Heap
  • Graph
Github Link
